input: The smell of freshly cut grass reminded me of my childhood summers spent playing outside
output:
The fresh scent of newly mown grass took me right back to the summer days of my youth, filled with endless outdoor adventures.

The new scent reminded me of those carefree summer days as a kid when I'd play outside.
complianceText:
